app.mainScriptNotFound: Could not find [data-name="mainScript"], update reminder is disabled
app.refreshPrompt: Please refresh the page in time to update to avoid affecting usage

crud.batchActionConfirm: Are you sure you want to execute {action}?
crud.deleteConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete "{name}"?
crud.deleteWarning: This action cannot be undone, please proceed with caution
crud.warnCreateDetailForm: detailForm is required when actions include create
crud.warnReadDetailForm: detailForm is required when actions include read
crud.warnUpdateDetailForm: detailForm is required when actions include update

upload.dragUpload: Click or drag files to this area to upload
upload.maxFilesWarning: Only {num} files can be uploaded at most, excess files will be ignored.

crud.warnBatchDeleteRequestDeleteByRecords: requestDeleteByRecords is required when actions include batch_delete
crud.warnCreateRequestCreateByValues: requestCreateByValues is required when actions include create
crud.warnDeleteProps: deleteProps and requestDeleteByRecord are required when actions include delete
crud.warnReadRequestGetByRecord: requestGetByRecord is required when actions include read
crud.warnUpdateRequest: requestGetByRecord and requestUpdateByValues are required when actions include update

crudOfList.warnAtLeastOneSearch: At least one column with search set to true is required in CRUDOfList columns
crudOfList.warnOnlyOneSearch: Only one column with search set to true is allowed in CRUDOfList columns
